description: The image displays four boxes of edible insect snacks on a desk. Two boxes on the left are labeled 'Larvets' and contain mealworms in Cheddar Cheese and BBQ flavors. The two boxes on the right are labeled 'Crick-ettes' and contain crickets in Salt N' Vinegar and Sour Cream & Onion flavors. Each box prominently displays the insects and the flavor, aiming to attract those interested in alternative, sustainable snack options.
poem:
There once was a snack quite unique,
With flavors both bold and oblique.
From worms to the crickets,
In boxes they pick it,
A taste that some truly do seek.
